title: Pixel 4xl keeps crashing randomly.
content: Pixel 4xl keeps crashing randomly. Doesnt matter what battery %. Won't turn back on until plugged in. Needs to be off for at least 5mins before plugged in to register. After that the battery icon appears. And I have to manually turn the phone back on. Has happened 2-3 times a day
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
